header: The Picture-Story of the Boss Who Stole

verse: Jesus said to His followers, “There was a rich man who put a boss over his houses and lands. Someone told him that his boss was not using his riches in a right way.

header: Jesus Teaches That the Law Is Not Finished

verse: The proud religious law-keepers heard all these things. They loved money so they made fun of Jesus.
Jesus said to them, “You are the kind of people who make yourselves look good before other people. God knows your hearts. What men think is good is hated in the eyes of God.

header: The Rich Man and the Man Who Begged for Food
